--- title: Train functions keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Functions that wrap the whole training processes" --- 
def train_normalizer(hparams):
    model = Normalizer(hparams)
    model.fit()
    return model

Trains a models.pl_modules.Normalizer unet with parameters defined in params.norm.hparams. Parameters for this task can be found in params.norm.

train_classifier[source]

train_classifier(hparams)

Trains a GradesClassifModel for grade classifications with parameters defined in hparams. Parameters for this task can be found in params.norm.
